properties.name: Avec
properties.description: Posted by Attrill615 W. Randolph St, chicago ILNot BBQ - Tapas. Much of their food is cooked over wood fires or in a wood fired oven - If you have only one food in Chicago it should be their chorizo stuffed dates wrapped in bacon. Best. Food. Ever.

properties.name: Barbara Ann's BBQ
properties.description: Posted by Attrill7617 S. Cottage Grove Ave, Chicago, ILGreat real BBQ - a Chicago classic. Take out only.

properties.name: Berger Bros. Charcoal
properties.description: Posted by AttrillCommercial charcoal distributor - cash only, open from 8-4 weekdays. It\'s a commercial supplier, so know what you want when you go there (it\'s a friendly place, but they aren\'t there to answer questions). They have 40 lb.s bags of Cleveland Lump for 5 and large boxes of wood chunks or chips for 5-30. They have pecan, apple, cherry, oak, hickory, mesquite as well as some others I can\'t remember.

properties.name: Calvin's BBQ
properties.description: Posted by Attrill2540 W. Armitage Ave, Chicago, ILYou can smell the hickory smoke from blocks away. A great traditional BBQ spot.

properties.name: Fat Willy's Rib Shack
properties.description: Posted by Attrill2416 W. Schubert, Chicago, ILGreat true BBQ. Is really popular right now and the waits can be long.

properties.name: Fogo de Chao
properties.description: Posted by Attrill661 N. LaSalle St., Chicago, ILGreat Argentinian all you can eat meat fest. Expensive for dinner, but reasonable for lunch

properties.name: Honey 1 BBQ
properties.description: Posted by Attrill2241 N. Western Ave, Chicago, ILAnother great traditional BBQ spot - one of my favorites!

properties.name: Hutchinson Field - Grant Park
properties.description: Posted by Attrill

properties.name: Lem's Bar-B-Que-House
properties.description: Posted by Attrill311 E. 75th St, chicago ILA Chicago classic, deffinitely worth the trip.

properties.name: Leon's Bar B Que
properties.description: Posted by Attrill1640 E. 79th St, chicago ILLeon\'s, since 1940. Can\'t go wrong. There are four locations across the city. Take out only.

properties.name: Leon's Bar B Que
properties.description: Posted by Attrill1200 W. 59th St, chicago ILAnother of Leon\'s BBQ\'s - all are consistently good. Take out only.

properties.name: Leon's Bar B Que - The Original
properties.description: Posted by Attrill8249 S. Cottage Grove Ave, chicago ILThe original Leon\'s. Enough said. Take out only.

properties.name: Leon's Famous Ribs
properties.description: Posted by Attrill 2418 N. Ashland Ave, Chicago, ILOne of four locations of a local BBQ chain, very good ribs and tips! Take out only.

properties.name: Moo and Oink
properties.description: Posted by Attrill7158 S. Stony Island, chicago ILIt\'s Moo and Oink - do I need to say any more?

properties.name: Noon O' Kebab
properties.description: Posted by Attrill4661 N. Kedzie Ave, chicago ILGreat kebabs!

properties.name: Peoria Packing
properties.description: Posted by Attrill1307 W Lake St, Chicago ILA really great meat market - the entire meat department is refridgerated and you pick the meat you want from piles on stainless steel tables. Great prices, great pork (every type - including entire heads), lamb, beef, sausages, and some fish.

properties.name: Reza's
properties.description: Posted by Attrill432 W Ontario St, Chicago, ILA Mideastern kebab type place. They have a lunch buffet for 0 or so that\'s great - rotating buffet menu includes leg of lamb, beef tenderloin kebabs, and always has great chicken and ground beef kebabs. Outdoor seating in the summer too.

properties.name: Sahar Meat Market II
properties.description: Posted by Attrill4829 N Kedzie Ave, chicago ILNot a restaurant, a market. Great deals on spices and other items like grape leaves, dates, and hard to find mid eastern and mediterranean ingredients. Very high quality Halal meat, the beef, lamb and goat are all top notch at good prices.

properties.name: Smoke Daddy
properties.description: Posted by Attrill1804 W. Division St, chicago ILGreat NC style BBQ. The combo platter is great. Live music later at night.

properties.name: Smoque
properties.description: Posted by Attrill3800 n. pulaski, chicago IL

properties.name: Uncle John's BBQ
properties.description: Posted by Attrill337 E 69th Street, chicago ILFormer pitmaster from Barbara Ann\'s new place - I have yet to try it, but if Mack is running it, it must be good. Take out only.

properties.name: Weber Grill Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Attrill 539 N. State St, Chicago, ILSeems like it may be a sales gimmick - but if it is, they\'re doing it right. Seems destined to become a major chain at some point, but they do a great job grilling a variety of meats and have some vegetarian options as well. 312-467-9696
